response.overview: Deep in Kenya's Masai Mara, the northern reaches of the Serengeti, an unprecedented story unfolds as five lion brothers navigate their journey from playful cubs to formidable predators. Over five remarkable years, our cameras follow this exceptional quintet, documenting their unique bonds and individual personalities. Meet the legendary brothers, each known to the local Masai people: Oloborr, the strongest and natural leader; Olomina, whose slight limp doesn't prevent him from being the most sexually active; the reserved Olosiadu; Lorkulup, who follows his brothers' lead; and the ambitious Orpadan, always eager to be at the forefront of the action.
response.title: Lion Brothers A Dangerous Family
